text: William Grawn Milliken (March 26, 1922 - October 18, 2019) was an American politician. He served as the 44th Governor of Michigan from January 22, 1969 to January 1, 1983. He was a member of the Republican Party. Milliken was born in Traverse City, Michigan. He died on October 18, 2019 in Traverse City at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Governors of Michigan Category:Lieutenant Governors of Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Traverse City, Michigan
title: William Milliken
